name: COREY LAJOIE
description: Corey LaJoie returns for another full-time season in the NASCAR Cup Series with Go Fas Racing. He earned two top-10 finishes in 2019 with the team. LaJoie is a third generation racer and a very well-known name in the racing world. His grandfather, Don LaJoie, is a member of the New England Auto Racing Hall of Fame alongside his father, Randy LaJoie, who won the Xfinity Series Championships in 1996 and 1997.
